reviews.text: Lovely station,clean,nice flower displays great staff

Penrith is quite a busy station with trains to and from Glasgow, Edinburgh, Manchester (inc. Manchester Airport) and London with many stops in between. Toilets are available and lifts enable easy access to platforms. Tickets can be purchased at the staffed ticket office. Buses arrive at the stop outside the station serving routes to many of the favourite destinations in Cumbria.

Amazing staff! My father and I hung out at the station waiting for a late night bus on a really chilly night. Peter invited us to sit in the waiting area (with lovely, comfortable seats). An hour or so later, we were very pleasantly surprised when he offered us hot drinks and brought us some local snacks from the staff room. Lovely service and a beautiful station!
Great little train station ! The staff are always cheerful and able to help when needed. They also support my favourite charity, Penrith Mountain Rescue Team, by selling books in the station.
